TraitDef.label: Thu'um Mastery
TraitDef.description: The ancient art of the Thu'um, or Dragon Shouts - a form of magic that harnesses the power of the dragon language. Those who master the Thu'um can speak in the dragon tongue and bend reality to their will.

li.label: Thu'um Apprentice
li.description: A novice in the ancient art of the Thu'um. Has learned the basics of dragon speech and can perform simple shouts with limited power.

li.label: Thu'um Adept
li.description: An experienced practitioner of the Thu'um who has learned multiple shouts and can channel greater power through their voice. Their understanding of the dragon language grows deeper.

li.label: Thu'um Master
li.description: A master of the Thu'um whose voice carries the power of dragons. They have learned many shouts and can speak them with devastating effectiveness, their very words reshaping reality.

li.label: Draconic Voice
li.description: One whose mastery of the Thu'um approaches that of the ancient dragons themselves. Their voice resonates with draconic power, capable of earth-shaking shouts that can change the course of battle and bend the world to their will.
